code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";export const useFetch=function(apiPath){let queryTerm=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"";const[data,setData]=useState([]);const apikey="47edbe810731dc15c1339516c498c485";const url=`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/${apiPath}?api_key=${apikey}&query=${queryTerm}`;useEffect(()=>{async function fetchMovies(){const response=await fetch(url);const json=await response.json();setData(json.results);}fetchMovies();},[url]);return{data};};
